mapper.select: SELECT RNO, TNO, USERID, RCONTENT, TO_CHAR(RDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') RDATE FROM REPLY WHERE TNO = #{tno} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(RNO) DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY(RNO, TNO, USERID, RCONTENT, RDATE) VALUES (replyrno_sequence.nextval, #{tno}, #{userid}, #{rcontent}, systimestamp)
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY SET RCONTENT=#{rcontent} WHERE RNO=#{rno}
